definition[0]: the central part of a computer that deals with the commands and information it is given
definition[1]: a machine or person that processes food or other materials before they are sold or used
definition[2]: the central part of a computer that does the calculations on the information put into it
example[2]: systems that need a big expensive central processor to work
definition[3]: a company that prepares substances, especially food, for sale or as part of another product
example[3]: Georgia officials blocked sales by an Atlanta milk processor after detecting contamination in its milk.
